metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3125 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The mod_tls module in ProFTPD before 1.3.5b and 1.3.6 before 1.3.6rc2 does not properly handle the TLSDHParamFile directive, which might cause a weaker than intended Diffie-Hellman (DH) key to be used and consequently allow attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.5b-1').
